skin_cancer.description: Skin cancer diagnosis using dermatoscopic images

Benign.info: Non-cancerous skin lesion that doesn't spread to other parts of the body
Benign.treatment_overview: Monitoring and regular check-ups; removal if necessary

Malignant.info: Cancerous skin lesion that can invade surrounding tissue and spread
Malignant.treatment_overview: Surgical removal, chemotherapy, radiation therapy, or immunotherapy

pneumonia.description: Pneumonia detection from chest X-ray images

Normal.info: Healthy lungs with no signs of infection

Pneumonia.info: Lung infection causing inflammation in air sacs
Pneumonia.treatment_overview: Antibiotics, rest, fluids, and in severe cases hospitalization
